evidence.claim: The company uses AWS for its cloud infrastructure.
Caregiver's Home Solutions adheres to HIPAA regulations for data protection.
The platform supports HL7 FHIR endpoints for health information exchange.
Integration with EHR systems is facilitated through REST APIs.
Webhook integrations allow real-time data updates and notifications.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence of X12 or EDI transaction handling.
